santha sarwesas widyalayiya krikat kandayama charith harshana dayarathna (nayaka), shashika dulshan (upanayaka), keshara nuwantha, pasindu manupriya, risira wirasuriya, chethaka denuwan, pushpitha dilshan, shanaka didulantha, ruwindu rochana, mathisha madhushan, nawin shahith, pasan thaththsara, nipun rangith, janindu jayaswith, rithik anuradha, chiran neththaru, hirun anjana, charith nethsara, waruna gamage,dinura dilmin roshan priyankara (krikat bhara aacharya) ti. di. munasinha (puhunukaru) ee. em. priyantha (kanishta puhunukaru) shri lanka pasal krikat sangamaya sanwidhanaya karana anthara pasal krikat tharagawaliye di kotasa niyojanaya karana santha thomas widyalaya mewara tharagawaliye di dakshatha da samagin ruhunu nil maha satanata piwisenne prawegakari pithikaruwek lesin hadinwena nayaka mihisal amoda kerehi wadath balaporoththu thabagenaya.
